title: Game Tiles
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a game is exclusively streamed on Appletv+
AND the user understands they will not be able to watch the game on the MLB app
custom_steps: WHEN the user views a game tile for a matchup streaming/deeplinking to Appletv+
custom_expected: THEN the game tile will display a pill with the copy "Watch on Appletv+"

title: Modals
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a game is exclusively streamed on Appletv+
AND the user understands they will not be able to watch the game on the MLB app
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the pill to watch on Appletv+
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive a modal that replaces the tv feeds
AND if the user selects an Apple+ game, Apple TV+ specific blackout error message is displayed.

title: Appletv+ Messaging
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user wants to watch a game that wass exclusively on Appletv+ streaming
AND the game is archived
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the game tile
custom_expected:
THEN the Appletv+ modal will no longer be displayed
AND the game will be viewed as a regular archived game on MLB.tv

title: Tapping on Apple TV+ Game Tile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Watch tab or Team Page
AND the user selects a game that is streaming exclusively on Apple TV+
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the modal that displays after tapping on the game tile
custom_expected: THEN the user will have the option to Open the APPLE TV+ app on their device OR Listen with MLB Audio on the MLB app

title: Open Apple TV+ Option
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Watch tab or Team Page
AND the user selects a game that is streaming exclusively on Apple TV+
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Apple TV+ Option on the modal
custom_expected: THEN the user is deeplinked to the Apple TV+ app on their device

title: Listen with MLB Audio Option
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Watch tab or Team Page
AND the user selects a game that is streaming exclusively on Apple TV+
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Listen with MLB Audio option
custom_expected: THEN the user will be sent to the audio section of the MLB app to listen to the game

title: Archived Apple TV + game-  Scoreboard & Watch View Game Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user
AND an Apple TV+ game that is archived is available

NOTES: The conditions for this test can be simulated by https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com:443/api/epg/v2/search* with the mastapi_appletv_archive_game_in_tiles.json available at this link(to large to upload): https://drive.google.com/file/d/139ICHJk8PwpD7uaVl7oSEHjiDzMUnc5C/view?usp=sharing

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user sees the game on the scores page in expanded mode
(If you using the attached proxy file, the game to observe is the Tampa vs. Boston game)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no Apple TV + text is present in the game on the schedule
AND the game appears as a normal archived game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user sees the game on the scores page in compact mode
(If you using the attached proxy file, the game to observe is the Tampa vs. Boston game)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no Apple TV + text is present in the game on the game tile
AND the game appears as a normal archived game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user sees the game on the Watch View Games Tab
(If you using the attached proxy file, the game to observe is the Tampa vs. Boston game)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no Apple TV + text is present in the game on the game tile
AND the game appears as a normal archived game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user sees the game on the Watch View Games Tab
AND the user clicks the game
(If you using the attached proxy file, the game in question is the Tampa vs. Boston game)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app responds to the click like other archived games (plays for entitled, messages for non-entitled)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user sees the game in the in-game scoreboard
(If you using the attached proxy file, the game in question is the Tampa vs. Boston game)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no Apple TV + text is present in the game on the game tile
AND the game appears as a normal archived game

title: Archived Apple TV+ game- in-player scoreboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user
AND an AppleTV+ game is archived on today's date and other games are currently live

NOTE: This is tricky to simulate because it requires a live game in addition to the simulated archived Apple TV+ game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user sees the game in the in-game scoreboard(while playing one of the non-Apple TV+ games
AND the user observes the Apple TV+ game card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Watch on Apple(Apple is an icon)tv+ badge is NOT present in the game tile

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user sees the game in the in-game scoreboard(while playing one of the non-Apple TV+ games
AND the user clicks the Apple TV+ game card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app responds to the click like other archived games (plays for entitled, messages for non-entitled)

title: Archived Apple TV+ game- teams tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user
AND an archived Apple TV+ game is available on today's date
custom_steps: WHEN the user sees the game on the team page
custom_expected:
â€¨THEN no Apple TV + text is present in the game on the schedule
AND the game appears as a normal archived game

title: Live Apple TV+ game- team tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user
AND a live YouTube TV+ game is available

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user sees the game on the team tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Apple TV+ text should be available on the schedule
AND an Apple TV+ button will display below

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user sees the game on the team tab
AND the user clicks the Apple TV+ button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a modal should be displayed with "Watch on Apple TV+" and "This exclusive MLB broadcast is HD on Apple TV+"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user's device is set to Spanish
AND the user sees the game on the team tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a bar will be displayed with "Ver en Apple Tv+" at the top of the game card

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the Apple TV+ button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a modal should be displayed with "Ver en Apple Tv+" and "Esta transmisiÃ³n estÃ¡ disponible para ver solo en tv.apple.com"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user repeats these steps in the opposing light/dark mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the outcome is the same

title: Live Apple TV+ game- scoreboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user
AND an Apple TV+ game is live

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views the game on the scoreboard in expanded mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN "Watch on Apple TV+" text is visible in the game card
AND an Apple TV+ button is available under the scores

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user views the game on the scoreboard in expanded mode
AND the user clicks the Apple TV+ button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a modal displays with "Watch on Apple TV+" and "This broadcast is available to watch only at tv.apple.com"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user's device is set to Spanish
AND the user views the game on the scoreboard in expanded mode
AND the user clicks the Apple TV+ button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a modal displays with "Ver en Apple Tv+" and "Esta transmisiÃ³n estÃ¡ disponible para ver solo en tv.apple.com"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views the game on the scoreboard in compact mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the "Watch on Apple(Apple is an icon)tv+" badge is present in the game tile

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the game tile for the game on the scoreboard in compact mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app redirects to the Gameday page for the game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user repeats these steps in the opposing light/dark mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the outcome is the same

title: Live Apple TV+ game- Watch View Games Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user
AND an Apple TV+ game is live

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views the game on the Watch View Games Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Watch on Apple(Apple is an icon)tv+ badge is present in the game tile

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user views the game on the Watch View Games Tab
AND selects the game tile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a modal displays with "Watch on Apple TV+" and "This broadcast is available to watch only at tv.apple.com"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user's device is set to Spanish
AND the user views the game on the Watch View Games Tab
AND selects the game tile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a modal displays with "Ver en Apple TV+" and "Esta transmisiÃ³n estÃ¡ disponible para ver solo en tv.apple.com"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user repeats these steps in the opposing light/dark mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the outcome is the same

title: Live Apple TV+ game- in-player scoreboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user
AND a live Apple TV+ game is available

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views the game on the in-player scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Watch on Apple(Apple is an icon)tv+ badge is present in the game tile

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user views the game on the in-player scoreboard
AND selects the game tile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a modal displays with "Watch on Apple TV+" and "This broadcast is available to watch only at tv.apple.com"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user's device is set to Spanish
AND the user views the game on the in-player scoreboard
AND selects the game tile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a modal displays with "Watch on Apple TV+" and "Esta transmisiÃ³n estÃ¡ disponible para ver solo en tv.apple.com"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user repeats these steps in the opposing light/dark mode
NOTE: The player is always forced to dark mode regardless of the app or device settings
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the outcome is the same

title: Pregame Apple TV+ game-Watch View Games Tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user
AND an Apple TV+ game is in pregame state with MEDIA_OFF

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user observes the game tile for the game on the Watch View Games Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the "Watch on Apple(Apple is an icon)tv+" badge is present in the game tile

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the game tile for the game on the Watch View Games Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN nothing happens

title: Pregame Apple TV+ game- scoreboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the scoreboard
AND an AppleTV+ game is available in the pregame state with MEDIA_OFF

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the scoreboard is in expanded mode
AND the user observes the Apple TV+ game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN "Watch on Apple TV+" messaging is present above the scores section for that game
AND a Preview button is visible below the scores section for that game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the preview button in expanded mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app navigates to the Gameday page for the game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the scoreboard is in compact mode
AND the user observes the Apple TV+ game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the "Watch on Apple(Apple is an icon)tv+" badge is present in the game tile

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the game tile for the game in compact mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app navigates to the Gameday page for the game

title: Pregame Apple TV+ game- team tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user
AND and Apple TV+ game is available in a preview state for the current day with MEDIA_OFF

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views the game from the team page of one teams involved in the game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN "Watch on Apple TV+" messaging is present above the scores section for that game
AND a Preview button is visible below the scores section for that game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user switches to the the opposing light/dark mode and returns to the team page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN "Watch on Apple TV+" messaging is present above the scores section for that game
AND a Preview button is visible below the scores section for that game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user's device is set to Spanish
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN "Ver en Apple TV+" messaging is present above the scores section for that game

title: Preview Apple TV+ game- in-player scoreboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user 
AND an AppleTV+ game is available in the pregame state with MEDIA_OFF for the current day
AND other games have live feeds available

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user opens another feed
AND clicks the scores option
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the game should be visible on the in-player scoreboard
AND the "Watch on Apple(Apple is an icon)tv+" badge is present on the game tile for the game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the game tile for the game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN nothing happens

title: Cancel Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Watch tab or Team Page
AND the user selects a game that is streaming exclusively on Apple TV+
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the modal to watch on Apple TV+
custom_expected:
THEN the user has the option to select cancel
AND the user will be able to navigate the MLB app again

title: Tapping Outside Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Watch tab or Team Page
AND the user selects a game that is streaming exclusively on Apple TV+
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps outside of the modal without selecting any options
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to navigate the MLB app again 
AND the modal will disappear

title: Returning from Appletv+ App
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Watch tab or Team Page
AND the user selects a game that is streaming exclusively on Apple TV+
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects OPEN Apple TV+
AND the user is sent to APPLE TV+ app
custom_expected:
THEN the user can select MLB on the top-left of the page if they wish to return to the MLB app
AND selecting MLB will send the user back to the MLB app and the page they were most recently visiting
